message: Let's start fair. I think this is a good beginning.
I think you're being too generous, let's try for more!
Let's split it down the middle this time. I think we can both do better with a fair deal.
I'm not sure splitting it down the middle is the best we can do, let's try to squeeze out a bit more for myself!
Let's try a compromise. This is closer to what you proposed, but it's still a fair split.
I'm not convinced a compromise is necessary, I think I can do better than that!
We're running out of time. I'm willing to take less to avoid getting nothing at all.
You're running out of time, but I'm not running out of options. This is my last chance to get a good deal.
We're both going to lose a lot if we don't reach a deal. This is my final offer.
You're getting desperate, and I'm not feeling generous. This is my last chance to get a good deal, so I'm going for it!
I'm willing to accept nearly anything at this point, but I need something. This is my last chance, please don't let us both lose everything.
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any more generous. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
